alert.note: Alert for Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Shirley Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 27 at 2:55AM MST until November 28 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...West to southwest winds 35 to 45 MPH with gusts up to 65 MPH expected. * WHERE...Central and northern Carbon County including Rawlins, Muddy Gap, and Shirley Basin. * WHEN...11 AM MST today until 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Shirley Basin
